description:
codereview: always use HTTPS

The new version of rietveld pushed 1.5 hours ago
requires HTTPS now, otherwise it issues a 301
to HTTPS which we barfed on.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=4d1c9e968c62 ***

codereview: always use HTTPS

The new version of rietveld pushed 1.5 hours ago
requires HTTPS now, otherwise it issues a 301
to HTTPS which we barfed on.

R=golang-dev
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/6782135

LGTM

This is going to break people who are using alternate servers that
don't support https but let's fix that later.

subject: code review 6782135: codereview: always use HTTPS
